posts.post_content:
Not quite, Sooku, you're missing one card - [Cyclopean Tomb](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=11), which was printed without mana cost at all.  
  
Oh, and let me respell your comment more accurately, Guest:  
"The most *gorgeous* of the Alpha misprints, this card was *great* at a 2 CMC...it remains *a rather useless* card at 4 CMC..."  
Even back then this wouldn't have been broken alongside with [Crusade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crusade) or [Bad Moon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bad Moon) i guess, and these days you still get cards like [Honor of the Pure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Honor of the Pure). It would be a powerful card, but not a broken one.
